fields.description: Convert 60fps mpegts files into 30fps lossless avi, resize to 480x272, deinterlace
Convert 60fps mpegts files into 30fps lossless avi, resize to 640x360, deinterlace
Converts a given video to theora ogv 1200k bitrate, two pass
fields.command: ffmpeg2theora --videobitrate 1200 --keyint 30 --audiobitrate 128 --samplerate 44100 --optimize --two-pass --license "http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/" --copyright "No Copyright. The person who associated a work with this document has dedicated this work to the Commons by waiving all of his or her rights to the work under copyright law and all related or neighboring legal rights he or she had in the work, to the extent allowable by law." -o "$TARGET" "$SOURCE"

fields.description: Converts a given video to theora ogv 2040k bitrate, two pass
fields.command: ffmpeg2theora --videobitrate 2040 --keyint 30 --audiobitrate 128 --samplerate 44100 --optimize --two-pass --license "http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/" --copyright "No Copyright. The person who associated a work with this document has dedicated this work to the Commons by waiving all of his or her rights to the work under copyright law and all related or neighboring legal rights he or she had in the work, to the extent allowable by law." -o "$TARGET" "$SOURCE"

fields.description: Converts a given video to h2.64 baseline mp4 1000k bitrate, two pass
fields.command: ffmpeg -i "$SOURCE"  -b 1000k -an -pass 1 -vcodec libx264 -vpre hq -vpre libx264-baseline -f ipod -threads 0 -benchmark -y /dev/null&&ffmpeg -i "$SOURCE" -b 1000k -pass 2 -vcodec libx264 -vpre hq -vpre libx264-baseline -acodec libfaac -ab 128k -ar 44100 -threads 0 -benchmark -y "$TARGET"

fields.description: Converts a given video to h2.64 baseline mp4 1700k bitrate, two pass
fields.command: ffmpeg -i "$SOURCE"  -b 1700k -an -pass 1 -vcodec libx264 -vpre hq -vpre libx264-baseline -f ipod -threads 0 -benchmark -y /dev/null&&ffmpeg -i "$SOURCE" -b 1700k -pass 2 -vcodec libx264 -vpre hq -vpre libx264-baseline -acodec libfaac -ab 128k -ar 44100 -threads 0 -benchmark -y "$TARGET"

fields.description: Generate black and white low contrast JPG from the second #2 of a video
Generate a JPG, from the second #2 of a video

Converts a given video to dirac ogv 1000k bitrate
fields.command: ffmpeg2dirac --videobitrate 1000 --keyint 30 --audiobitrate 128 --samplerate 44100 --license "http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/" --copyright "No Copyright. The person who associated a work with this document has dedicated this work to the Commons by waiving all of his or her rights to the work under copyright law and all related or neighboring legal rights he or she had in the work, to the extent allowable by law." -o "$TARGET" "$SOURCE"

fields.description: Convert a given 30fps AVI file into 24fps using detelecine filter and scale to 480x272
Convert a given 30fps AVI file into 24fps using detelecine filter and scale to 640x360
Convert 60fps mpegts files into 24fps huff avi, deinterlace, pulldown remove and scale to 480x272
